description:
Sasaki Ryuujirou is the mentally unbalanced subordinate to http://anidb.net/ch17534 [Shibui Matsunosuke], the corrupt magistrate of an oppressed town, who assigns him to protect his bratty son, http://anidb.net/ch17536 [Tomonoshin].
Ryujiro`s right arm is chopped off by http://anidb.net/ch4865 [Mugen] after the altercation in the tea house, driving him over the edge. He burns the tea house down in retaliation, inadvertently putting http://anidb.net/ch4863 [Fuu] out of work and http://anidb.net/ch4864 [Jin] and Mugen in prison.
Source: Samurai Champloo Wiki
name: Sasaki Ryuujirou
